description:
Entrepreneurs, senior managers and executives all have something in common: they need to deliver concrete financial results. To do so, they need to understand how Finance works and how they can identify the top 3 to 5 actions they need to take to deliver an awesome performance.

This course has been designed to learn exactly that. The course starts by focusing on the foundation of Finance, what it is, how it works and what financial documents you need to master.

We then deep dive into the 3 key success factors that drive the performance of any business and learn about the ratios that measure the different dimensions that any business leader needs to track.

And finally, we learn concrete methods to identify what actions you need to take, whether we come from sales, marketing or any other support function, to directly influence business resultsâ€¦

Follow me into this course and on the path to a very strong business performance
title: Finance Fundamentals for Non Finance Leaders
